job_overview: We are looking forward on recruiting a Ugandan housemaid who is in good health and able to work. Some of the responsibilities that will be required of her are mainly the house chores. The applicant must submit her CV to the responsible recruitment agency in Uganda. She has to be 21 years and above and of which there has to be a consent from her family in regards to her travels. She will be expected to be minimum a high school graduand and able to speak proper English. She will be handling all the house responsibilities such as cleaning the house, sweeping and mopping the house, washing of utensils and laundry, taking care of the kids and guidance to the children. She will be expected to give hand in cooking. However, this will all be in the right procedures of the Ministry in Uganda. She has to go through a training before being recruited. She has to also provide a police letter of a good conduct.  She has to present a medical report of her health status for further to proceed with her recruitment.

job_overview: A House Maid is responsible for maintaining cleanliness and orderliness in a private household. The role involves routine housekeeping duties such as cleaning rooms, washing dishes, doing laundry, and sometimes preparing meals or caring for children or elderly members. A successful house maid is organized, reliable, and able to work independently while respecting the privacy and preferences of the household.

job_overview: A Domestic Worker provides essential services to households, ensuring that the home runs smoothly and remains in good condition. Their duties can vary depending on the employer's needs but generally include cleaning, laundry, cooking, and caring for children or elderly family members. They may also perform administrative tasks or run errands. The role demands trustworthiness, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or under minimal supervision.

job_overview: A Female worker is required who has at least completed high school or graduated and is able to speak English and with a recommendation from the guardians to travel to Saudi Arabia. She must have passed the medical requirements and with training provided to her. She will be doing the house chores such as washing clothes (laundry), cleaning the house washing utensils, sweeping the compound, and ensuring that the house is always clean and not messed up. She must be 18 years and above and fit for work.

job_overview: The typical restaurant crew member completes a variety of food preparation, customer transaction and sanitation jobs. A main responsibility during the shift is to take customer orders and process payments. They may also work on preparing and expediting food orders. In between customers, crew members perform cleaning duties, such as clearing tables and sanitizing food preparation areas.
